exposurecontrol: Aperture-Priority (A) Long exposure M* mode Manual (M) Programmed auto with flexible program (P) Shutter-Priority Auto (S)
recordingmedia: CompactFlash© (CF) (Type I, compliant with UDMA) SD SDHC SDXC
flashmode: Front-curtain sync (normal) Rear-curtain sync Red-Eye reduction Red-Eye reduction with slow sync Slow sync
liveviewfunction: Live View Shooting Photography Live View Mode Movie Live View Mode Virtual Exposure preview in Bulb/Time setting
builtinwifi: Eye-Fi Compatible WT-4A UT-1 Communication Unit + WT-5A Wireless Transmitter
imagetype: JPEG: JPEG-Baseline Compliant; can be selected from Size Priority and Optimal Quality JPEG: JPEG-Baseline Compliant with fine (approx 1:4), Normal (approx 1:8) or Basic (approx 1:16) Compression NEF (RAW): 12 or 14 bit, lossless compressed, compressed, or uncompressed; small size available (12-bit uncompressed only) TIFF (RGB)
dimensions: Approx. 4.90" x 5.80" x 3.30" (H x W x D)
selftimer: 2, 5, 10, 20 sec.; 1 to 9 exposures at intervals of 0.5, 1, 2, or 3 sec. Timer duration electronically controlled
playback: Auto Image Rotation Full-frame and thumbnail (4, 9, or 72 images) Highlights Histogram Display Image Comment Movie Playback Movie Slideshow Playback with Zoom Slideshow
flashexposurecompensation: -3 to +1 EV in increments of 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV
movierecording: Full HD 1,920x1,080 / 60 fps Full HD 1,920x1,080 / 50 fps Full HD 1,920x1,080 / 30 fps Full HD 1,920x1,080 / 25 fps Full HD 1,920x1,080 / 24 fps HD 1,280x720 / 60 fps HD 1,280x720 / 50 fps
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing AE-L/AF-L button Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single-servo AF)
meteringsystem: TTL exposure metering using 91,000-pixel RGB sensor
coverage: FX (36x24): 100% Horizontal and 100% Vertical (Approx.) 1.2x (30x20): 97% Horizontal and 97% Vertical (Approx.) DX (24x16): 97% Horizontal and 97% Vertical (Approx.) 5:4 (30x24): 97% horizontal and 100% vertical (Approx.)
focustype: Nikon Advanced Multi-CAM 3500FX autofocus sensor module with TTL phase detection
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using 91,000-pixel RGB sensor are available with built-in flash and SB-910, SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, SB-400, or SB-300; i-TTL balanced fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighting metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
exposurecompensation: + / - 5 EV in increments of 1/3, 1/2 or 1 EV
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark VIII with AF Area Brackets (grid lines can be displayed)
fileformat: Compliant with DCF (Design Rule for Camera File System) 2.0 DPOF (Digital Print Order Format) EXIF 2.3 (Exchangeable Image File Format for Digital Still Cameras) PictBridge
focusingmodes: Auto AF-S/AF-C selection (AF-A) Continuous-servo (AF-C) Face-Priority AF available in Live View only and D-Movie only Full-time Servo (AF-A) available in Live View only and D-Movie only Manual (M) with electronic rangefinder Normal area Single-servo AF (AF-S) Wide area
